pages.text: $(br2)$(br2)This chapter will define the powers that can be found in the Soldier section of the class tree.

$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#armor_expert)Armor Expert$()$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#attack_speed_i)Attack Speed I$()$(br)$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#attack_speed_ii)Attack Speed II$()$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#bark_skin)Bark Skin$()$(br)$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#combat_training)Combat Training$()$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#fletching)Fletching$()$(br)$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#hide_in_the_shadows)Hide in the Shadows$()$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#iron_skin)Iron Skin$()$(br)$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#passive_regen)Passive Regen$()$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#pathfinding)Pathfinding$()

$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#sharpshooter)Sharpshooter$()$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#strength)Strength$()$(br)$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#trueshot)Trueshot$()$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#warriors_health_i)Warrior's Health I$()$(br)$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#warriors_health_ii)Warrior's Health II$()$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#warriors_health_iii)Warrior's Health III$()$(br)$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#weapon_specialist_i)Weapon Specialist I$()$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#weapon_specialist_ii)Weapon Specialist II$()$(br)$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#wreckless_attack)Wreckless Attack$()

pages.title: Armor Expert
pages.text: You gain a passive +4 armor toughness$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#soldier_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Attack Speed I
pages.text: Your attack speed is increased by 10%$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#soldier_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Attack Speed II
pages.text: Your attack speed is increased by 20%$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#soldier_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Bark Skin
pages.text: You gain a passive +2 armor$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#soldier_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Combat Training
pages.text: You gain 943 PMMO Combat xp$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#soldier_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Fletching
pages.text: When crafting arrows, you create 16 instead of 4$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#soldier_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Hide in the Shadows
pages.text: You become invisible in light levels less than 7, however, sky light will expose you$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#soldier_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Iron Skin
pages.text: You gain a passive +6 armor$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#soldier_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Passive Regen
pages.text: You have a passive heal of 1 health (0.5 hearts) every 2 seconds$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#soldier_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Pathfinding
pages.text: You can jump 50% higher while sprinting$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#soldier_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Sharpshooter
pages.text: You gain +4 damage (2 hearts) to your arrows$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#soldier_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Strength
pages.text: You gain a passive level of strength$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#soldier_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Trueshot
pages.text: Your arrows gain a 50% damage increase$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#soldier_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Warrior's Health I
pages.text: You gain +2 health (1 heart)$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#soldier_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Warrior's Health II
pages.text: You gain +2 health (1 heart)$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#soldier_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Warrior's Health III
pages.text: You gain +4 health (2 heart)$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#soldier_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Weapon Specialist I
pages.text: You gain +2 generic attack damage$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#soldier_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Weapon Specialist II
pages.text: You gain +4 generic attack damage$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#soldier_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Wreckless Attack
pages.text: You gain +2 generic attack damage when below or at 8 health (4 hearts)$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_powers#soldier_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()
